Package org.uma.jmetal.operator.selection

Interface SelectionOperator<Source,​Result>

Type Parameters:
Source - Class of the source object (typically, a list of solutions)
Result - Class of the result of applying the operator
All Superinterfaces:
Operator<Source,​Result>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BestSolutionSelection, BinaryTournamentSelection, DifferentialEvolutionSelection, EnvironmentalSelection, EnvironmentalSelection, HVTournamentSelection, NaryRandomSelection, NaryTournamentSelection, PESA2Selection, RandomSelection, RankingAndCrowdingSelection, RankingAndDirScoreSelection, RankingAndPreferenceSelection, SpatialSpreadDeviationSelection
public interface SelectionOperator<Source,​Result>
extends Operator<Source,​Result>
Interface representing selection operators
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro
